contents.text: Thank you for calling Talkdesk, the Contact Center for Innovative Enterprises in San Francisco.
For sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
To connect with our enterprise sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise sales team.

navigationGoals: Set up a new enterprise account with a sales representative
I’d like to discuss enterprise account options and see if there’s a veteran discount before opening a new account.
I need to discuss enterprise-tier licensing options and API integration quotas.
I’d like to set up a new business account and need help getting started.
I’d like to discuss enterprise licensing options for my university physics research group.

contents.text: For product demonstrations and pricing details, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product demo and obtain detailed pricing information
I need a product demo and pricing information to evaluate if this solution fits my organization’s budget.
I’d like a technical product walkthrough and a detailed pricing breakdown.
I need a demonstration of your product and information on pricing.
I need to schedule a product demonstration and get academic pricing details.

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press 2.
To report an issue or request technical assistance, press 1.
Please hold for technical support. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: Report an urgent technical issue and get support
I’m having an issue with my call routing integration and need technical assistance to resolve it.
My API integration is returning OAuth token errors; I need technical support.
I’m having trouble with my phone system dropping calls and need technical assistance.
I’m having trouble with my current setup and need technical support.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review recent billing charges and update payment details
I have a question about a recent billing charge and need help understanding and addressing my account statement.
I need to update my billing info and review the latest invoice charges.
I have a question about a recent bill that seems incorrect and need help understanding the charges.
I need to review my latest invoice and clarify billing charges.
